4318270.name: Drilling Demo
4318270.description:
ABOUT DRILLING

"DRILLING" is a relaxing game focusing on the pure joy of digging and moving forward, rather than flashy combat or fierce competition. You play as "Mr. Drill," who has awakened deep underground, and begin an expedition toward the surface. Mine 9 different tiers of rare ores found across various layers, and use the resources you gather to upgrade your drill’s size, power, movement speed, and other modules.

HOW TO

  • Move Left/Right: A / D

  • Dig: Left Mouse Button (Hold)

  • Special Move (Jetpack): Space

  • Shop:

    • Select / Buy: F

    • Navigate / Switch Items: Q (Left), E (Right)

ABOUT MR. DRILL

"Mr. Drill," who lived peacefully on the Moon, decided to travel to Earth. However, due to an unexpected accident during the trip, he ended up buried deep underground. After waking from a long slumber, Mr. Drill has only one goal: to return to his home, the Moon. Pierce through the layers of the earth, climb to the surface, and help Mr. Drill on his journey to reach the moon once again.
